  • Method Details

    • type

      public SikuliActions type​(java.lang.String pathToTargetElementImage, java.lang.String text)
      Checks if there is any text in an element, clears it, then types the required string into the target element.
      Parameters:
      pathToTargetElementImage - relative path to the desired element image following this example "src/test/resources/DynamicObjectRepository/" + "sikuli_googleHome_searchBox_text.PNG"
      text - the target text that needs to be typed into the target element
      Returns:
      a self-reference to be used to chain actions

    • type

      public SikuliActions type​(byte[] targetElement, java.lang.String text)
      Checks if there is any text in an element, clears it, then types the required string into the target element.
      Parameters:
      targetElement - the image of the desired element in the form of a byte[]
      text - the target text that needs to be typed into the target element
      Returns:
      a self-reference to be used to chain actions
